products.name: Mate-70
products.description:
A sleek and affordable smartphone with modern features, ideal for everyday use.
Chipset: Mediatek Helio G81 Ultra
OS: Android 14, HyperOS
RAM: 4GB, 6GB, 8GB
Internal Storage: 128GB, expandable via microSD card
Display: 6.88 inches, HD+ resolution, 600 nits brightness
Camera: Dual 50MP, 8MP front
Connectivity: Dual SIM, 4G, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, GPS
Ports: USB Type-C, 3.5mm audio jack
Colors: Midnight Black, Sage Green, Dreamy Purple, and Starry Blue.
Battery: 5160mAh, 18W charging

products.name: OPPO Reno-13
products.description:
Combines elegant design with robust capabilities for professionals and enthusiasts.
Display	6.83″ 1.5K AMOLED
Storage:	16GB+1TB
Camera:	50MP / 50MP
Processor:	Dimensity 8350
Battery:	5800mAh

products.name: Honor-x60-pro
products.description:
A high-performance phone designed for multitaskers with a touch of sophistication
Display:
6.78-inch OLED display
Full HD+ resolution (1080 x 2400 pixels)
120Hz refresh rate
Curved edges for a premium look and feel
Processor:
MediaTek Dimensity 920 chipset
Octa-core (2.5 GHz)
RAM and Storage:
8GB / 12GB RAM options
128GB / 256GB internal storage (non-expandable)
Camera:
Rear Camera:
50 MP primary camera (with OIS)
50 MP ultra-wide camera
2 MP depth sensor or macro camera
Front Camera:
32 MP for high-quality selfies
Possibly enhanced by AI for improved portrait and beauty shots
Battery:
4800 mAh
66W fast charging support (for rapid charging)
Operating System:
Android 12 with Magic UI (Honor’s custom skin)

products.name: Huawei Mate-70 Pro Plus
products.description:
A premium smartphone offering cutting-edge technology and exceptional durability
Display:6.82-inch OLED display
Resolution: 1344 x 2772 pixels
120Hz refresh rate for smooth scrolling and gaming
HDR10+ support for better color and contrast
Processor:Huawei Kirin 9000S chipset (possibly 5nm architecture)
Octa-core (high-performance cores for demanding tasks)
RAM and Storage:8GB / 12GB RAM options
256GB / 512GB internal storage (non-expandable, UFS 3.1)
Camera:Rear Camera:50 MP primary camera with wide aperture (f/1.8)
64 MP telephoto lens with 3.5x optical zoom and up to 100x digital zoom
13 MP ultra-wide-angle camera
Laser autofocus and Optical Image Stabilization (OIS) for enhanced low-light performance
Front Camera:13 MP wide-angle camera for high-quality selfies and video calls
Battery:4700 mAh
88W fast charging support (wired)
50W wireless charging support
Operating System:HarmonyOS 4.0 (Huawei’s custom OS, based on Android, without Google services)
Other Features:In-display fingerprint sensor
5G connectivity support
USB Type-C port
Stereo speakers for immersive sound
IP68 rating for water and dust resistance
.

products.name: POCO-C75
products.description:
High-end device with fast performance and innovative features, perfect for tech enthusiasts.
Display:6.71-inch LCD display
Resolution: 1650 x 720 pixels (HD+)
90Hz refresh rate for smooth scrolling
Processor:MediaTek Helio G85 chipset
Octa-core processor with up to 2.0 GHz clock speed
RAM and Storage:4GB / 6GB RAM options
64GB / 128GB internal storage (expandable via microSD card)
Camera:Rear Camera:50 MP primary camera with f/1.8 aperture
2 MP depth sensor for portrait shots
Front Camera:
5 MP selfie camera
Battery:5000 mAh
18W fast charging support
Operating System:MIUI 14 for Poco (based on Android 13)
Other Features:Side-mounted fingerprint sensor
4G LTE connectivity
USB Type-C port
Dual SIM support
3.5mm headphone jack
Design:Plastic back panel with a glossy finish
Minimalistic design with Poco branding at the back
Flat edges and a modern appearance

products.name: Vivo-X200 Pro Mini
products.description:
Compact and lightweight, it offers excellent performance in a stylish package.
Display:6.78-inch AMOLED display
Resolution: 2400 x 1080 pixels (Full HD+)
120Hz refresh rate for smooth visuals and responsive touch
Processor:MediaTek Dimensity 1300 chipset (or similar mid-range 5G chipset)
Octa-core processor (up to 3.0 GHz for high performance)
RAM and Storage:8GB / 12GB RAM options
128GB / 256GB internal storage (non-expandable)
Camera:Rear Camera:
50 MP primary camera with f/1.8 aperture
13 MP ultra-wide camera
12 MP telephoto camera for zoomed-in shots and bokeh effects
Front Camera:32 MP for high-quality selfies with AI enhancements
Battery:4500 mAh
44W fast charging support (for quick battery top-ups)
Operating System:Funtouch OS (based on Android 13)
Other Features:In-display fingerprint sensor for security
5G connectivity support
USB Type-C port
Dual SIM support
Stereo speakers for immersive sound
Design:Premium glass and metal construction with curved edges
Sleek and modern look with a glossy back panel
Vivo branding visible on the back

products.name: Tecno Spark 30C 5G
products.description:
An advanced smartphone with impressive camera capabilities and robust performance.
Display:6.6-inch IPS LCD display
Resolution: 1600 x 720 pixels (HD+)
90Hz refresh rate for smoother visuals
Processor:MediaTek Dimensity 700 chipset (5G-capable)
Octa-core processor (up to 2.2 GHz)
RAM and Storage:4GB / 6GB RAM options
64GB / 128GB internal storage (expandable via microSD card)
Camera:Rear Camera:50 MP primary camera
2 MP depth sensor for portrait shots
Front Camera:8 MP for selfies
Battery:5000 mAh
18W fast charging support
Operating System:HiOS (based on Android 12)
Other Features:Side-mounted fingerprint sensor for easy access
5G connectivity support
USB Type-C port
Dual SIM support
3.5mm headphone jack
Design:Plastic back panel with a modern, glossy finish
Tecno branding on the back
Slim and lightweight build

products.name: iQOO Z9 Turbo Plus
products.description:
A flagship model with blazing speed, perfect for gaming and multitasking.
Display:6.67-inch AMOLED display
Resolution: 2400 x 1080 pixels (Full HD+)
120Hz refresh rate for smooth gaming and scrolling
Processor:Qualcomm Snapdragon 870 chipset (high-performance, 5G-enabled)
Octa-core processor (up to 3.2 GHz for powerful performance)
RAM and Storage:8GB / 12GB RAM options
128GB / 256GB internal storage (non-expandable)
Camera:Rear Camera:64 MP primary camera with f/1.8 aperture
13 MP ultra-wide camera
2 MP depth sensor for portrait shots
Front Camera:16 MP for clear and vibrant selfies
Battery:4500 mAh
66W fast charging support (for rapid charging)
Operating System:Funtouch OS (based on Android 12)
Other Features:In-display fingerprint sensor for added security
5G connectivity support for faster data speeds
USB Type-C port
Stereo speakers for immersive audio
Design:Premium design with a sleek, glossy finish
Slim profile with minimal bezels
iQOO branding on the back

products.description: Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max official / unofficial Price. Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max comes with LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED capacitive touchscreen , 6.7 inches, 110.2 cm2 (~89.8% screen-to-body ratio) display, i 17 , Hexa-core (2x + 4x) .
